title.narrative: Documentation of the Wayang Kulit Siam of Kelantan

description.narrative: To support the comprehensive documentation of the Wayang Kulit Siam, or shadow play, of Kelantan, an uninterrupted 40-day performance of the Kelantan version of the Ramayana epic. The Wayang Kulit Siam is one of several cultural traditions banned in Kelentan in 1991, an action that adversely affected the generational transmission of the tradition and the number of trained performers. This project involves the staging and documentation of the performance and workshops and training programs for local youth.

transaction.usg:treasury-account: International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement

title.narrative: Creating a Victim-Centered Response

description.narrative: IJM is working directly with the Malaysian government to implement effective, victim-centered prosecutions, provide victim services, and better identify potential trafficking victims. IJM will work directly with local NGO Global Shepherds Berhad to provide direct legal training for Malaysian officials and service providors. This training will focus on trauma-informed engagement with a further focus on helping victims understand the legal process in Malaysia and how trafficking survivors fit in. IJM and Global Shpeherds Berhad will also work with local NGO shelters and service providers to increase the level of trauma-informed care provided to victims.
